traits.name: Corrosive Form
entries: A creature that touches the Ooze Master or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) acid damage. Any nonmagical weapon that hits the Ooze Master corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative âˆ’1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to âˆ’5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition that hits the Ooze Master is destroyed after dealing damage.
The Ooze Master can eat through 2-inch-thick, nonmagical wood or metal in 1 round.

traits.name: Instinctive Attack
entries: When the Ooze Master casts a spell with a casting time of 1 action, it can make one pseudopod attack as a bonus action.

traits.name: Spider Climb
entries: The Ooze Master can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Pseudopod
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 13 (3d6 + 3 damage) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6 damage) acid damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
